name: Boomer Instinct lite feedback edition with bug fix
name_original: Boomer Instinct lite feedback edition with bug fix
description:
Parody Game

The 30 year old brawler boomer takes the streets to show the youngster how tough their life made them compared to gen z despite his disillusion go for the high score

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W: jump

A: move left

S: does nothing

D: move right

Space bar or e: attack

r:special attack after beating 6 or 7 other boomers

Collect energy drinks to restore your degrading health
